section.title: Step 1: Opening a Blank Styleguide
section.para: Brightspot maintains views inside a styleguide. In this step, you run and open the blank styleguide.

step.para: Ensure port 3000 on your local machine is open.
Open a new command prompt (Windows) or Terminal (Mac/*nix), and change the current directory to brightspot-tutorial/.
Run gulp styleguide. A server starts.
In your web browser, open http://localhost:3000/_styleguide. An empty styleguide appears.
